name: Ebon Severing
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A 10 foot tall, 1 foot wide blade of unholy magic erupts from the ground at target point within range, then sweeps forward up to 30 feet in any horizontal direction you choose. Creatures in the way must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d6 unholy damage, plus 1d6 unholy damage for every used or destroyed hit die. A creature that succeeds takes half damage.

For each die that rolls a 6, one hit die is destroyed on every damaged creature. The spell cuts through any Abjuration spell that would be in the way, ignoring its effects as if it was never cast.
empower: Doubles the number of hit dice destroyed. Blade width increased to 10 feet.
